messages.subject: isp mail problems
messages.msgSnippet: my isp was having mail problems earlier in the week.  many messages to my mailbox were delayed by up to 48 hours, and i suspect that some messages were lost,
messages.messageBody:
my isp was having mail problems earlier in the week. many messages to
my mailbox were delayed by up to 48 hours, and i suspect that some
messages were lost, as well. if you've sent me anything of importance
this week and i haven't responded in a timely manner, please resend or
give a call. thanks!

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p
